fields.title: Fish Fried Rice
fields.ingredients: fish (cooked or fillets), cooked rice, peas, carrots, soy sauce, green onions, oil
fields.instructions: Cook fish and flake it. Stir fry peas and carrots in hot oil. Add cooked rice and soy sauce, mix well. Add flaked fish and green onions, cook for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot.

fields.title: Fish Deviled Eggs
fields.ingredients: boiled eggs, mayonnaise, mustard, paprika, salt, pepper, cooked fish flakes
fields.instructions: Cut boiled eggs in half, remove yolks. Mix yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, salt, pepper, and cooked fish flakes. Fill egg whites with mixture. Sprinkle paprika and serve chilled.

fields.title: Fish Salad Sandwich
fields.ingredients: boiled eggs, cooked fish flakes, mayonnaise, mustard, celery, salt, pepper, bread
fields.instructions: Chop boiled eggs and mix with cooked fish flakes, mayonnaise, mustard, chopped celery, salt, and pepper. Spread on bread slices and assemble sandwich. Serve chilled.

fields.title: Spanish Fish Tortilla
fields.ingredients: eggs, potatoes, onion, cooked fish flakes, olive oil, salt
fields.instructions: Thinly slice potatoes and onions. Fry in olive oil until tender. Beat eggs with salt and mix with potatoes, onions, and cooked fish flakes. Pour mixture into pan and cook until set. Flip to cook other side. Serve warm.

fields.title: Fish Bhurji (Indian Style Scrambled Fish)
fields.ingredients: eggs, cooked fish flakes, onion, tomato, green chili, turmeric, coriander powder, oil, salt, fresh coriander
fields.instructions: Heat oil, sauté onions and chili until soft. Add tomatoes and spices. Add cooked fish flakes and pour beaten eggs, scramble until cooked. Garnish with coriander and serve with bread or roti.

fields.title: Fish Egg Drop Soup
fields.ingredients: eggs, fish broth (or chicken broth with fish flavor), cornstarch, green onions, soy sauce, salt, pepper
fields.instructions: Boil fish broth and thicken with cornstarch. Slowly pour beaten eggs into hot broth while stirring to create egg ribbons. Add soy sauce, salt, pepper, and garnish with green onions. Serve hot.

fields.title: Fish Shakshuka
fields.ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, onion, garlic, bell pepper, paprika, cumin, cooked fish flakes, olive oil, salt, pepper
fields.instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and bell pepper in olive oil. Add tomatoes and spices, cook until sauce thickens. Add cooked fish flakes. Crack eggs into sauce, cover and cook until eggs are set. Serve with bread.
